sets.name: Core Set
sets.desc: The set that started it all!

sets.name: Awesome Level 9000
sets.desc: The first 'mini-set' bringing even more crazy factions to the pool!

sets.name: The Obligatory Cthulhu Set
sets.desc: A Madness-infused set with Cthulhu-themed factions!

sets.name: Science Fiction Double Feature
sets.desc: A mix of factions with a sci-fi feel!

sets.name: The Geeky Box
sets.desc: The first massive storage solution for the Smash Up sets.

sets.name: Monster Smash
sets.desc: A set with factions based on well-known scary monsters!

sets.name: Pretty Pretty Smash Up
sets.desc: A cute and girly-themed set!

sets.name: Smash Up: Munchkin
sets.desc: A crossover with the Munchkin universe.

sets.name: It’s Your Fault!
sets.desc: The first set with fan-voted factions.

sets.name: Cease and Desist
sets.desc: A set with factions based on popular franchises.

sets.name: What Were We Thinking?
sets.desc: A mix of surprising choices for factions.

sets.name: All Stars Event Kit
sets.desc: The first kit for Smash Up tournaments.

sets.name: Big in Japan
sets.desc: A set with factions based on popular Japanese franchises.

sets.name: Smash Up Sheep Promo
sets.desc: (Promotional pack) A free faction for all Smash Up followers.

sets.name: That ’70s Expansion
sets.desc: A set with factions coming straight from the '70s.

sets.name: TITANS Event Kit
sets.desc: The second kit for Smash Up tournaments.

sets.name: The Bigger Geekier Box
sets.desc: The even bigger storage solution for the Smash Up sets.

sets.name: Oops, You Did It Again
sets.desc: The second set with fan-chosen factions.

sets.name: World Tour: International Incident
sets.desc: A set featuring famous fighters from around the world. Also the first set in the World Tour series.

sets.name: World Tour Event Kit
sets.desc: The third kit for Smash Up tournaments. Also the second set in the World Tour series.

sets.name: Smash Up Penguins
sets.desc: (Booster pack) The single-faction pack that was supposed to be included in the World Tour Event Kit.

sets.name: Smash Up TITANS
sets.desc: (Booster pack) The pack that was included in the TITANS Event Kit.

sets.name: World Tour: Culture Shock
sets.desc: A set featuring tales and legends from around the world. Also the final set in the World Tour series, covering the last of the continents.

sets.name: Dead Reckoning Promo
sets.desc: A print-and-play card to promote AEG's Dead Reckoning game.

sets.name: Smash Up: Marvel
sets.desc: A crossover with the Marvel universe.

sets.name: Smash Up Goblins
sets.desc: (Booster pack) A pack to be purchased directly on AEG's online store.

sets.name: Smash Up Knights of the Round Table
sets.desc: (Booster pack) A pack to be purchased directly on AEG's online store.

sets.name: Smash Up: Disney Edition
sets.desc: A crossover with the Disney universe.

sets.name: 10th Anniversary
sets.desc: A limited-release box full of goodies to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the franchise.

sets.name: Excellent Movies, Dudes!
sets.desc: A set that celebrates the iconic movies of the 80s.

sets.name: Smash Teens
sets.desc: (Booster pack) A pack to be purchased directly on AEG's online store.

sets.name: Half Battle
sets.desc: A set that spoofs various child cartoon from the 80s.
